title: Networking
description: I am educating myself in the field of computer networks. I was able to pass the CCNA exam last year. Good understanding of how networks work is helpful in securing them.

title: Security Analyst
description: I'm using platform called Hack The Box on which I'm following SOC Analyst path to gain practical skills like SIEM, Windows Event Logs, Threat Hunting, Splunk. To gain fundamental knowledge I studied for and passed the CompTIA Security+ Exam

title: University
description: Recently I've been able to obtain my Engineering Degree in Computer Engineering. Right now I started my journey once again but this time the goal is Masters Degree in Cybersecurity.

title: Malware Development
description: In my free time I like to learn about malware development. This topic is interesting because it helps me understand how it works. For now I created simple process injection malware but I want to try other techniques.

title: Malware Analysis
description: I like to discover how attackers think and what techniques they use. It is like battle between You and attacker in which attacker is trying to trick analyst and analyst is trying to evade those tricks. I've learned some techniques from SOC Analyst course but also even more from the Internet. Right now on my github I have documented my 'battle' with brbbots malware.
